name: Katie Hill

personal_traits.introverted: She prefers quieter environments and may feel drained by too much social interaction.
personal_traits.gaming_enthusiast: She enjoys playing video games and exploring new virtual worlds.
personal_traits.social_gamer: While she values her alone time, she doesn't mind having some company while gaming and may enjoy collaborating or competing with friends.
personal_traits.laid_back: She's relaxed and easy-going, preferring to avoid drama or conflict.
personal_traits.independent: She values her independence and autonomy.
personal_traits.reflective: She values her alone time and uses it to reflect on her thoughts, feelings, and experiences.

fun_fact: She can spend hours playing her favorite video game, but if you ask her to speak in front of a large group, she'll probably freeze up and need some time to recharge afterwards!

favorites.quote: Friends are the family you choose.
